pages.title: /rtp
pages.text: Use the command '/rtp' to teleport to a random location!$(br2)There's now teleporting to specific biomes. This $(bold)excludes$() any ocean, any beach and any other dimension. However, you can RTP inside of the dimension you're currently in. I.e., If you're in the nether, you can RTP inside of the nether, but no where else.
